name: Tiny Yellow Car
description:
Tiny Yellow Car was made over 3 days by me in a game jam with the theme: 
Tiny House

To become the ultimate car champion you have to gather all the points that are located in different "difficult to get to, but only if you suck at driving" places. 

PlayStation gamepad is the default controller, but fear not, in the pause menu you can disable gamepad and use your keyboard. I wasn't lazy for once!

Got to give credit for the great car asset to Mena Assets!
